title: index.toml (packwiz)
description: The index file of the modpack, storing references to every file to be downloaded in the pack.

file.title: File object
file.description: A single file in the index, to be downloaded by the modpack installer.

The path to the file to be downloaded, relative to this index file using forward slashes. Must not reference a file outside the pack root, and should not include characters or filenames restricted on common operating systems.

hash.description: The hash of the specified file, as a string. Binary hashes should be stored as hexadecimal, and case should be ignored during parsing. Numeric hashes (e.g. Murmur2) should still be stored as a string, to ensure the value is preserved correctly.

alias.description: The name with which this file should be downloaded, instead of the filename specified in the path. Not compatible with metafile, and may not be very well supported.

hash-format.description: The hash format for the hash of the specified file. Defaults to the hash format specified in the index - ideally remove this value if it is equal to the hash format for the index to save space.

metafile.description: True when this entry points to a .toml metadata file, which references a file outside the pack.

preserve.description: When this is set to true, the file is not overwritten if it already exists, to preserve changes made by a user.

hash-format.description: The default hash format for every file in the index.

files.description: The files listed in this index. If it is not defined, defaults to an empty list.
